# The `helpr` package

## Overview

The `helpr` package contains numerous helper functions necessary for
generalized machine learning analyses.

It contains and exports numerous utilities and S3 generics used
throughout the my personal analysis suite. It intentionally favors base
R over higher level *tidyverse* to keep imports to a minimum.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Installation

``` r
# current dev version
remotes::install_github("stufield/helpr")

# or a specific version
remotes::install_github("stufield/helpr@v0.0.2")
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Usage

To load `helpr` simply make a call to
[`library()`](https://rdrr.io/r/base/library.html) as usual:

``` r
library(helpr)
```

## Help summary of the package

``` r
library(help = helpr)
```

## Notes about the package

TODO

TODO

TODO

# Package index

## Common S3 Generics

S3 generics used by multiple packages having the same S3 method.

- [`fit()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`tune()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_pos_class()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_classes()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_features()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_coef()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_type()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_params()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`calc_model_metrics()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`cross_validate()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`calc_predictions()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  : Common S3 Generics

## Checking

Boolean logical testing of an object.

- [`rep_lgl()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/rep_lgl.md) :
  All Values Same
- [`is_int_vec()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logicals.md)
  [`is_logspace()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logicals.md)
  [`is_monotonic()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logicals.md)
  [`has_length()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logicals.md)
  [`len_one()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logicals.md)
  [`is_chr()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logicals.md)
  [`is_dbl()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logicals.md)
  [`is_lgl()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logicals.md)
  [`is_int()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logicals.md) :
  Logical Testing

## Wrappers

Wrappers and alias functions.

- [`logit()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logit.md)
  [`expit()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/logit.md) :

  `Logit` and `Expit` Transformations

- [`rn2col()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/rownames.md)
  [`col2rn()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/rownames.md)
  [`has_rn()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/rownames.md)
  [`rm_rn()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/rownames.md)
  [`set_rn()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/rownames.md)
  [`add_rowid()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/rownames.md)
  : Helpers for Working With Row Names

- [`liter()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/liter.md)
  [`piter()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/liter.md) :
  List Iteration

- [`set_Names()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/set_Names.md)
  : Set Names of an Object

## Simple calculations

Various, simple, often used “calculation” utilities.

- [`calc_ccc()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/calc_ccc.md)
  : Calculate Concordance Correlation Coefficient
- [`calc_qvalue()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/calc_qvalue.md)
  [`plot(`*`<q_value>`*`)`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/calc_qvalue.md)
  : Calculate q-values
- [`calc_ss()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/calc_ss.md) :
  Calculate the Sum of Squared Errors
- [`fit()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`tune()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_pos_class()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_classes()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_features()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_coef()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_type()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`get_model_params()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`calc_model_metrics()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`cross_validate()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  [`calc_predictions()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/s3-generics.md)
  : Common S3 Generics
- [`get_outliers()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/get_outliers.md)
  : Get Indices of Statistical Outliers
- [`fit_gauss()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/fit_gauss.md)
  : Calculate Robust Gaussian Estimates
- [`p_value_FDR()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/p_value_FDR.md)
  [`plot(`*`<fdr>`*`)`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/p_value_FDR.md)
  : Calculate Benjamini-Hochberg FDR Corrected Values
- [`enrich_test()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/enrich_test.md)
  : Test for Enrichment
- [`normal_k2_mixture()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/normal_k2_mixture.md)
  [`plot(`*`<mix_k2>`*`)`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/normal_k2_mixture.md)
  : 2-distribution (k2) Gaussian Mixture Model

## Simple comparison

Compare vectors, calculate cross-tabulated counts and intersections of
vector contents.

- [`diff_vecs()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/diff_vecs.md)
  : Diff Two Vectors
- [`cross_tab()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/cross_tab.md)
  : Cross Tabulate Counts

## Convert and Subset Objects

Converting classes to data frames or tibbles and subsetting elements of
objects.

- [`add_class()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/add_class.md)
  : Add a Class to an Object
- [`convert2df()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/convert2df.md)
  : Convert R Objects to a Data Frame
- [`jagged_tbl()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/jagged_tbl.md)
  : Create a Jagged Tibble
- [`keep_it()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/elements.md)
  [`discard_it()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/elements.md)
  [`compact_it()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/elements.md)
  : Easily Subset Elements of Objects

## File System Utilities

File system useful utilities inspired by the [fs](https://fs.r-lib.org)
package.

- [`file_find()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`helpr_path()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`as_helpr_path()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`is.dir()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`ls_dir()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`info_dir()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`file_ext()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`` `file_ext<-`() ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`rm_file_ext()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`set_file_ext()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  [`as_helpr_bytes()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/filesystem.md)
  : Determine Path to File

- [`save_rds()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/save_rds.md)
  [`save_rda()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/save_rds.md)
  [`get_compression()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/save_rds.md)
  :

  Save Compressed `*.rds` File

- [`openR()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/openR.md) :
  Open File Interactively

## String Utilities

Simple utilities for manipulating strings inspired by the
[stringr](https://stringr.tidyverse.org/index.html) package.

- [`pad()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/strings.md)
  [`squish()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/strings.md)
  [`trim()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/strings.md)
  [`capture()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/strings.md) :
  Working with Strings

## Interface Utilities

Generalized utilities for UI signaling and text output inspired by the
[usethis](https://usethis.r-lib.org), [cli](https://cli.r-lib.org), and
[crayon](https://github.com/r-lib/crayon) packages.

- [`value()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`signal_done()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`signal_todo()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`signal_oops()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`signal_info()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`signal_rule()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`add_color()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`add_style`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`print(`*`<helpr_style>`*`)`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`` `$`( ``*`<helpr_style>`*`)`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`has_style()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md)
  [`rm_style()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/signal.md) :
  Signal Feedback to the Console UI
- [`symbl`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/symbl.md)
  [`show_symbols()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/symbl.md)
  : A list of UTF-8 or ASCII symbols.
- [`expect_error_free()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/unit-help.md)
  [`skip_on_check()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/unit-help.md)
  [`skip_on_test()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/unit-help.md)
  [`expect_snapshot_plot()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/unit-help.md)
  : Unit Test Helpers
- [`give_praise()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/give_praise.md)
  : Praise User
- [`dots_list2()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/dots_list2.md)
  : Dynamic List Param Collection Rename Elements of a List

## Formatting Utilities

Generalized utilities to facilitate consistency.

- [`create_form()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/create_form.md)
  : Create A Formula
- [`dater()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/dater.md) :
  Standardize Date Format
- [`write_text()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/write_text.md)
  [`read_text()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/write_text.md)
  [`write_latex_tbl()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/write_text.md)
  : Write to a Text File
- [`write_list()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/write_list.md)
  : Write List to CSV File

## Handlers

For capturing errors and dealing with verbose function calls.

- [`be_safe()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/handlers.md)
  [`be_quiet()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/handlers.md)
  [`be_hard()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/handlers.md)
  : Handle and Capture Side Effects

## Grapes

Series of special, possibly useful, infix operators.

- [`` `%||-%` ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/grapes.md)
  [`` `%@@%` ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/grapes.md)
  [`` `%@@%<-`() ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/grapes.md)
  [`` `%==%` ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/grapes.md)
  [`` `%!=%` ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/grapes.md)
  [`` `%===%` ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/grapes.md)
  [`` `%set%` ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/grapes.md)
  [`` `%!set%` ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/grapes.md)
  [`` `%[[%` ``](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/grapes.md) :
  Special Infix Operators

## Library Mode

A reproducible way to install temporary, perhaps non-standard packages
into a stable, reproducible environment for analysis by adding onto the
R library tree.

- [`lib_mode()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/lib_mode.md)
  [`lib_tree()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/lib_mode.md)
  [`is_lib_mode()`](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/reference/lib_mode.md)
  : Activate and Deactivate Lib Mode

# Articles

### Get Started

- [Introduction to
  helpr](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/articles/helpr.md):

### Library Mode

A reproducible way to install “time-capsuled” third party packages onto
the libarary tree to maintain a consistent analysis environment.

- [Library Mode](https://stufield.github.io/helpr/articles/lib-mode.md):
